sentences.en: "He's moving in here," Maria said. "So that's the end of the matter."
sentences.cn: “他就要搬来住了，”玛丽亚说，“那么就这么定了。”

sentences.en: "Hello, Maria," he said, and she blushed again.
sentences.cn: “你好，玛丽亚，”他说，这让她脸上又泛起了红晕。
“谢谢你，”玛丽亚声音嘶哑地说道。

sentences.en: Christopher Columbus set sail for the New World in the Santa Maria.
sentences.cn: 克里斯托弗·哥伦布从圣玛丽亚启航前往新大陆。

sentences.en: He addressed his remarks to Eleanor, ignoring Maria.
sentences.cn: 他和埃莉诺聊了聊，而没搭理玛丽亚。

sentences.en: He had his hand on Maria's shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他把一只手搭在玛丽亚的肩上。

sentences.en: He was engaged to Miss Julia Maria Boardman.
sentences.cn: 他和朱莉娅·玛丽亚·博德曼小姐订婚了。

sentences.en: Her high voice really irritated Maria.
sentences.cn: 她的尖嗓门实在让玛丽亚很恼火。

sentences.en: Kim's mother agreed to vouch for Maria and get her a job.
sentences.cn: 金的母亲同意为玛丽亚担保，好让她找份工作。

sentences.en: Kneeling in front of the open hearth, old Maria was fanning the smoldering fire.
sentences.cn: 老玛丽亚跪在壁炉前的空地上，扇着闷燃的炉火。

sentences.en: Like her, Maria was a Roman Catholic.
sentences.cn: 和她一样，玛丽亚也是天主教徒。

sentences.en: Maria loved both the children. There was never a hint of favouritism.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚对两个孩子都疼爱有加，向来一视同仁。

sentences.en: Maria was talking baby talk to the little one.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚正用儿语和小家伙说话。

sentences.en: Maria wore a layered white dress that rustled when she moved.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚穿一袭白色节裙，一动裙子就窸窣作响。

sentences.en: Steven: Yes, but Maria might not be back in. You might have to help me.
sentences.cn: 史蒂文： 是的， 但是玛丽亚有可能回不来， 你可能得帮帮我。

sentences.en: You were always so practical, Maria.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚，你以前一向很注重实效。

phrases.tran_cn: 玛利亚•莎拉波娃（网球运动员）
圣马丽亚（美国加利福尼亚州西部城市，巴西南部城市）；圣马利亚活火山（位于危地马拉西部）；圣马利亚号（哥伦布第一次远航发现美洲所乘之船）
